    Boosts the defense stat of the player by 4 for the duration of a fight.

    Emp.consume(Character consumer)
    Removes the item from the player's inventory.
    The logic to skip the trap room is implemented in the PlayerRoomVisitor.visit(com.tloj.game.rooms.TrapRoom) method
    void
    GreatHealthPotion.consume(Character consumer)
    Restores the Health Points of the player by 50.
    void
    GreatManaPotion.consume(Character consumer)
    Restores the Mana of the player by 30.
    void

    Restores the Health Points of the player by 20.
    void
    ManaPotion.consume(Character consumer)
    Restores the Mana of the player by 10.
    void
    Ragu.consume(Character consumer)
    Restores all HP and Mana, boosts def stat and the atk inflicted by 2 for the duration of a fight.
    void
    SpecialKey.consume(Character consumer)
    Consumes the Special Key, removing it from the inventory of the character.
    The logic to open the special loot room is implemented in the PlayerRoomVisitor.visit(com.tloj.game.rooms.LootRoom) method

  • Uses of Character in com.tloj.game.entities.characters

    Subclasses of Character in com.tloj.game.entities.characters
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    BasePlayer
    Class to represent the BasePlayer class in the game
    It has the following fixed initial attributes:
    25 health points
    15 mana points
    3 attack points
    3 defense points
    5 maximum weight capacity
    10 money
    It has the Focus ability
    class 
    DataThief
    Class to represent the DataThief class in the game
    It has the following fixed initial attributes:
    20 health points
    10 mana points
    4 attack points
    2 defense points
    5 maximum weight capacity
    0 money
    It has the Steal ability
    class 
    Hacker
    Class to represent the Hacker class in the game
    It has the following fixed initial attributes:
    18 health points
    20 mana points
    3 attack points
    3 defense points
    5 maximum weight capacity
    10 money
    It has the CheatEngine ability
    class 
    MechaKnight
    Class to represent the MechaKnight class in the game
    It has the following fixed initial attributes:
    30 health points
    5 mana points
    1 attack points
    5 defense points
    5 maximum weight capacity
    15 money
    It has the Guard ability
    class 
    NeoSamurai
    Class to represent the NeoSamurai class in the game
    It has the following fixed initial attributes:
    20 health points
    10 mana points
    5 attack points
    1 defense points
    5 maximum weight capacity
    15 money
    It has the Daburu ability
